casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Reginald U. FULLARD. No. 42P15-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Reginald Fullard, for Fullard, Reginald U. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of July 2015 by Defendant for Order of Transcripts:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
